languages.text: Подобный трофей может носить лишь тот, кто в полной мере постиг древнюю истину — во вселенной существует только война.
Such a trophy can only be worn by one who has fully comprehended an ancient truth — that in the universe there exists only war.
languages.original_text: Подобный трофей может носить лишь тот, кто в полной мере постиг древнюю истину — во вселенной существует только война.

traits.locale_text: Such a trophy can only be worn by one who has fully comprehended an ancient truth — that in the universe there exists only war.
Such a trophy can only be worn by one who has fully comprehended an ancient truth — that in the universe there exists only war.

Such a trophy can only be worn by one who has fully comprehended an ancient truth — that in the universe there exists only war.

languages.text: Tal obsequio solo puede llevarlo puesto quien haya comprendido una verdad tan antigua como la vida: en el universo solo existe la guerra.
languages.original_text: Such a trophy can only be worn by one who has fully comprehended an ancient truth — that in the universe there exists only war.

traits.locale_text: Tal obsequio solo puede llevarlo puesto quien haya comprendido una verdad tan antigua como la vida: en el universo solo existe la guerra.

languages.text: このような戦利品は、宇宙には戦争しか存在しないという古代の真理を完全に理解した者だけが身につけることができる。
languages.original_text: Such a trophy can only be worn by one who has fully comprehended an ancient truth — that in the universe there exists only war.

traits.locale_text: このような戦利品は、宇宙には戦争しか存在しないという古代の真理を完全に理解した者だけが身につけることができる。

languages.text: “浩瀚宇宙之中，唯有无尽战争。”——只有充分理解这个古老真理的人，才有权佩戴这样的徽章。
languages.original_text: Such a trophy can only be worn by one who has fully comprehended an ancient truth — that in the universe there exists only war.

traits.locale_text: “浩瀚宇宙之中，唯有无尽战争。”——只有充分理解这个古老真理的人，才有权佩戴这样的徽章。

languages.text: Eine derartige Trophäe kann nur von jemandem getragen werden, der eine uralte Wahrheit verinnerlicht hat ... dass das Universum allein aus Krieg besteht.
languages.original_text: Such a trophy can only be worn by one who has fully comprehended an ancient truth — that in the universe there exists only war.

traits.locale_text: Eine derartige Trophäe kann nur von jemandem getragen werden, der eine uralte Wahrheit verinnerlicht hat ... dass das Universum allein aus Krieg besteht.

languages.text: Un tel trophée ne peut être arboré que par quelqu'un qui a pleinement saisi une vérité séculaire : dans l'univers, la guerre est omniprésente.
languages.original_text: Such a trophy can only be worn by one who has fully comprehended an ancient truth — that in the universe there exists only war.

traits.locale_text: Un tel trophée ne peut être arboré que par quelqu'un qui a pleinement saisi une vérité séculaire : dans l'univers, la guerre est omniprésente.

languages.text: Böyle bir nişan, ancak evrende sadece savaş olduğu şeklindeki kadim gerçeği tam manasıyla kavramış biri tarafından takılabilir.
languages.original_text: Such a trophy can only be worn by one who has fully comprehended an ancient truth — that in the universe there exists only war.
